solution_line_template: Two zones with {vents_per_zone} vents per zone is {num_zones}*{vents_per_zone}=<<{num_zones}*{vents_per_zone}={total_vents}>>{total_vents} vents.
Thus, the ${system_cost} system costs ${system_cost}/{total_vents} = $<<{system_cost}/{total_vents}={cost_per_vent}>>{cost_per_vent} per vent.
